MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH54 postcode area of Livingston, affecting properties in Rushbank and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 09:05am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:30am on the 26th of March 2021.
